content.body: yulia: Respect your decision, but I would still be interested in learning more about the "too complex" - I know you had that complaint earlier, but I've not been able to fully understand it, given the similarity in complexity (imo) to the corresponding constructs in many other languages.

content.body: we should consider how to break up the proposal into smaller steps -- the argument has been "its all or nothing" and i disagree. This can have great improvements to JS if we do it in parts
